notes.text:
My rank up match I went first and opened gyokku, idaten, benten, and dakini and he opened really good with ninja but played it bad

He used to continuous spell to get alchemy draw 2
Did that play again and discarded a BDN to draw 2 lol and then 3SD to summon RDN???? Sets duplication and trans I’m sure

I draw MAR and gyokku his first set and then use MAR and he chains duplication right away into a FD flame armor haha GG. Lots of bad ninja players out there, when he should’ve won with BDN

Anyways CA for the stats
